column2: Koss Corp. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of stereo headphones and accessories. The company is headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin and currently employs 54 full-time employees. The firm operates in the audio/video industry segment of the home entertainment industry. The company markets a line of headphones, wireless Bluetooth headphones, wireless Bluetooth speakers, computer headsets, telecommunications headsets, active noise canceling headphones, and compact disc recordings of American Symphony Orchestras on the Koss Classics label. The company markets products used by consumers to listen to music, digital versatile discs (DVDs) in vehicles, sound bytes on computer systems, and other audio related media. The firm's products are sold through retailers, distributors, audio specialty stores, the Internet, direct mail catalogs, regional department store chains, discount department stores, grocery stores, electronics retailers, military exchanges and prisons. The company has a manufacturing facility in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Koss U.K. Limited is its subsidiary.
